:: Najah ::

Najah was getting tired to fire at his enemy, with a
quick movement he went towards his back and use his
rockets towards him.

:: Bat Probe ::

A Bat-probe left the cave where was Darkfate's hideout
and went towards Alliance's base.

:: Scorpyo ::

Scorpyo had arrived where his pray was, he located at
and was almost ready to shot.
